column4: I have already followed the instruction in the Ati Binary HowTo... no luck.
you got more of a response that I did.  Video problems may be to individual for the forum?
I have a similar problem but not as bad.
- its strange because everyone I talk to hasn't had any problems with 3D performance, but I have on EVERY distro I've tried.
I was about to start installing the ATI drivers to see how that went.  You saying its a bad course?  I haven't tried 3D much so not much help there - sorry.
- I wouldn't say it was a bad thing... just hasn't helped.  The how to caused a lot of problems for me, that's all.
wish the howtos had some why in there as well.  I'm using an Inspiron 9400 with an ATI Mobility Radeon x1400 - you?  (happy new year)
Permission denied when trying to open xorg.conf?  I'm in super user mode
did you you try to run through the guidance in the FixVideoResolutionHowTo (https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FixVideoResolutionHowto)?
